php.LBL_PUBLIC_URL_INFO: The URL will be used to send e-mail notifications and it will be possible to use the URL in the content, e.g. password reset in the Customer Portal, link to preview the record in the Customer Portal
php.LBL_ALLOWED_IPS_INFO:
Empty value - access from all servers.
If IP addresses are entered (after the decimal point), API access will be allowed only from these IP addresses.
Example:
php.LBL_WEBSERVICE_APPS_DESCRIPTION: Kreirajte i upravljajte aplikacijskim ključevima koji se integrišu putem API-ja.
php.LBL_MODAL_ALERT: The access data should be entered in the header in each API request.

js.JS_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati ključ?
